Title: Grupo Francisco Hernando Contreras v. Equatorial Guinea
Institution: ICSID - International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes
RulesOfArbitration: ICSID (International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes) Additional Facility Arbitration Rules (2006)
ApplicableTreaties: Agreement Between the Kingdom of Spain and the Republic of Equatorial Guinea on the Promotion and Reciprocal Protection of Investments (2003)
